description:
**Update**: Games can be played without a time limit now.

Dream Engine is a classic game emulator. It runs PC Engine/TurboGrafx-16 console games. With Dream Engine, you can play dozens of classic games that were available on the original console. Dream Engine comes with two sample games. More games (that are files with .pce extension) can be added to the application simply by placing them into dreamengine folder on the USB drive. 

This free version of Dream Engine differs from the paid version as follows. The paid version allows full screen game play in landscape mode, allows configuration of keyboard controls and enables state saving. These features are not available in the free version.
